item.description: Meet local business professions who are serious about growing their business through the power of referrals. Create relationships with other group members, get to know, like and trust them with your biggest client and they will do the same. These meetings are like having a sales force standing behind you looking to get you more business each week. Come visit and see for yourself how one hour a week changes the way you receive business.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through the outside door on the left by the canopy, that's our room.
item.name: Kearsage Business Builders, Hopkinton NH
